messages.title: Dear Resident
messages.content: The Conservatives are aiming for a landslide majority: Cities of London & Westminster will not decide the government, so why not get an MP who will work for you? The incumbent MP has little time for the constituency: I want to be a strong voice for local people in Parliament. I have proven myself as a tireless community and business leader, and am a real self-made man. If elected, I will throw my endless energy into standing up for you. I will hold regular surgeries and be an accountable, accessible and hard-working MP. I will fight cuts to local NHS services and schools, and seek solutions to the housing crisis.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will fight against a hard Brexit and push to get the best deal possible.
I will be a champion for local communities and small businesses.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Speaking up on the NHS, schools and housing
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will fight against cuts to schools, the NHS and social housing.
I will work with the Mayor, Sadiq Khan, to clean up our city's air.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Conservatives are aiming for a landslide majority: Cities of London & Westminster will not decide the government, so why not get an MP who will work for you?

issues.brexitEurope: I will fight against a hard Brexit and push to get the best deal possible.
issues.economy: I understand the needs of small business and recognize that healthy business needs a healthy economy. I will fight to get us the best possible Brexit deal.
issues.education: I will fight against cuts to schools.
issues.environment: I will work with the Mayor, Sadiq Khan, to clean up our city's air.
issues.health: I will fight against cuts to the NHS.
issues.socialWelfare: I will fight against cuts to social housing.

community.content: I will be a champion for local communities and small businesses.

politicalExperience.achievements: I am a proven community and business leader with endless energy.

contactInformation.address: 58 Old B. County Hall, South Bank, London SE1 7PN

endorsements.endorsement: I'm supporting Ibrahim because he exemplifies everything our city is: son of asylum seekers who has built a successful business while working to heal community divisions. London: Head and Heart.
Ibrahim Dogus is a passionate man. Passionate about our NHS, our city, our country, our future. He deserves our support and we deserve a Labour MP like Ibrahim Dogus.
Ibrahim has a proven record of standing up for local communities and small businesses. Active, enthusiastic and dynamic, Ibrahim will do our constituency proud as a candidate and our MP.
